content: There are numerous parks throughout the sovereign island country of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). This is a **list of parks in Singapore** that currently exist and have articles on Wikipedia. Most parks in Singapore are managed by the [National Parks Board](/wiki/National_Parks_Board), although smaller, neighbourhood parks are managed by the [Housing Development Board](/wiki/Housing_Development_Board). Most of these parks are connected via the [Park Connector Network](/wiki/Park_Connector_Network) (PCN) walking/running/cycling paths. This list is incomplete; you can help by adding missing items. *(June 2022)*NameTypeArea (m 2 {\displaystyle ^{2}} )Area (sq ft)[Admiralty Park](/wiki/Admiralty_Park)Nature270,0002,900,000[Ang Mo Kio
